Title: December Long Weekend in Cortelazor
Description: Cortelazor is once again preparing to celebrate a December long weekend full of activities, solidarity, and a festive Christmas atmosphere. On December 6 and 7, Plaza de Andaluc√≠a and Plaza del Olmo will become the gathering point for both residents and visitors.
Keywords: December long weekend, Cortelazor, Christmas activities, solidarity market, flamenco zambomba, traditional sweets, mass, procession
